use_case: Complete business automation for home mover businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Home Mover business owners, home services professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for home mover businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the home mover industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for home mover services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Home Mover businesses wanting to automate operations
New home mover businesses needing a complete system
Established home services companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Home Mover Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Home Mover Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
